en.title: FE's Thailand Country Licensee Office Opening Ceremony, 17th May 2008 (1)
en.content:
FE's Thailand Country Licensee's officical Opening Ceremony on 17th May 2008 was a GREAT SUCCESS, attended by well over 350 VIPs and Leaders from Thailand and Malaysia!

Occupying 6 storeys, FE's Thailand Country Licensee office is a test amount to Country Licensee Mr Don Chan's commitment and dedication for developing FE's Thailand market into the success it is today.

Amongst The VIPs Who Attended The Ceremony Are:

- HE Pramuan Ruchanaseree (former Deputy Minister of Interiors and President of Prachamati Party)
- General Dato Kitti Rattanachaya (former Southern Area Army Commander)
- Former Senator and Police General Soonthorn Saikwan
- Major General Khatiya Sawasdipol (Sae-Daeng)
- Police Major General Angkul Athorn Phatai.
- Lt.General Panom Batprakhon
- Dr. Kraiwat Sriwuttiwong (Owner of TV Stations)
- Prof. Dr. Vichit Phunyahotra
- Sambat Methanee PhD (Actor)
- Rit Luasa (Actor)
- Tipawan Pinpiban (Singer)
- Vinai Panthurat(Singer)
- Thewan Subsanyakorn (Father of Thai Jazz)
- Ramazan Ramazanov (WMC World Heavyweight Muay Thai Champion)
